name: 陳怡靜
objective:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.
This course is for students who have been studied Chinese for 1 year at least. Story is the most interesting to understand an article how to be built up from human's thoughts. Chinese is with complicated culture, so deconstruct the context would be the first part. Reading is the most important at this stage. Your listening skill and speaking kill might be A2.
